hadith.text: Narrated 'Abd Allah b. 'Abbas:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to recite in both rak'ahs of the dawn prayer: "Say: We believe in Allah and in the revelation given to us" (3:84) . This is in the first rak'ah and in the second rak'ah (he recited): "We believe in Allah and bear witness that we submit ourself (to Him)." (3:)
